headline: EXCLUSIVE: 12 News Did NOT Air AZ Gubernatorial Candidate Kari Lake’s Ad Exposing Corrupt Fake News During Purchased Time Slot – Why?

My campaign ad was scheduled to air at 1022pm on @12News (the station that employs the Leftist political reporter @brahmresnik who once called AZ GOP Nazis)

Arizona Gubernatorial Candidate Kari Lake DESTROYS Fake News Media – Kari’s First Political Ad Will Expose the BS on Arizona Stations During Their News Programs
Late last night, Kari Lake revealed that her commercial did not appear to air on 12 News.

The video, titled “Rigged Elections Have Consequences,” called out the fake news media for their silence on the stolen 2020 election and listed the terrible consequences we face, including our weak southern border and rampant inflation.

UPDATE:
12 News published an article clarifying that Kari Lake’s order “indicates the singular spot could air Monday or Tuesday evening during the 10 p.m. news.”
The commercial will air tonight.

He appeared to criticize the “minuscule buy” and even called it a “performative video Lake hopes will be boosted on social media.”
12 News didn’t boost it, but it did go viral on all platforms!
Lake: My campaign ad was scheduled to air at 1022pm on @12News (the station that employs the Leftist political reporter @brahmresnik who once called AZ GOP Nazis) I heard it didn’t air.
